data.title: Amazing boba tea and desserts!
data.text:
This is a legit Asian/Taiwanese tea spot, and it's amazing!

Came here with the brother-in-law to get boba for the family, and I was totally blown away by the selection and authentic asian flavors. They've got drinks like grass jelly with red bean, matcha with matcha pearls (yes, matcha-boba!), a milk pudding taro mango dessert that is to die for, and so much more. You can also customize most of the drinks for Sweetness, Ice Level, and Milkiness -- a great feature to any good boba/pearl milk tea shop.

Service was friendly and nice, and very helpful. 

Pro tip: follow them on Instagram or Facebook to get the daily secret code for 10% off your entire order!

Street meter parking available nearby.
